channel.title: Consulting on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Consulting on ZAP

item.title: Clue Security Services AG
item.description: The OWASP ZAP tool is a significant asset to Clue, as it is utilized on a daily basis by our security engineers. For the efficient design of a resilient WAF security policy, it is vital to reverse engineer the data flow of an application. OWASP ZAP offers an easy way to make the data flow transparent, to visualize the attack surface, and to develop tailor-made policies to minimize it.
